heading.name: Patient Status
heading.definition: % of patients (Rostered and non-Rostered) in the practice based on their status, including last visit.

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS ACTIVE SEEN WITHIN 12 MONTHS (latest visit <= 12 months) IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.pt_status = 'AC' and DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),fin.last_visit) <= 365 , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Active, Seen within 12 months",
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS ACTIVE SEEN 12-24 MONTHS AGO (latest visit > 12 months and < 24 months) IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.pt_status = 'AC' and DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),fin.last_visit) > 365 and DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),fin.last_visit) < 720 , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Active, Seen 12-24 months ago",
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS ACTIVE NOT SEEN WITHIN 24 MONTHS (latest visit >= 24 months) IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.pt_status = 'AC' and (DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),fin.last_visit) >= 720 OR fin.last_visit IS NULL) , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Active, not seen in 24 months",
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS INACTIVE IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.pt_status = 'IN' , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Inactive",
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS DECEASED IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.pt_status = 'DE' , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Deceased",
-- PERCENT OF TOTAL PATIENTS NOTED AS OTHER (not active, not inactive, not deceased, not deleted?) IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.pt_status NOT IN ('AC','DE','IN') , 1, 0) ) , 0 ) AS "% Other Patient Status"
FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, d.patient_status AS pt_status, LV.appt_date as last_visit FROM demographic d
-- Notations for last visit in appointments LEFT JOIN ( select demographic_no,max(appointment_date) as appt_date from appointment group by demographic_no
) LV ON (d.demographic_no = LV.demographic_no) ) fin
